text: Alloh taolo ʙa ahli Makka, Pajomʙarero az xudaşon ʙa nazdaşon firistod, ki ū Muhammad sallallohu alajhi va sallam ʙud, nasaʙu rostī va amonataşro medonistand, vale on ciro ki ʙarojaşon ovard, qaʙulaş nakardand, durūƣgūjaş nomidand, pas azoʙi saxt va gurusnagiju xavf on sitamkoronro faro girift
